reviews.subject: Introduction to Psychology
reviews.review: Dr. Smith is knowledgeable and engaging. He makes complex topics easy to understand.

reviews.subject: Advanced Mathematics
reviews.review: Dr. Johnson is an excellent professor. She provides clear explanations and encourages questions.

reviews.subject: History of Art
reviews.review: Prof. Brown is passionate about the subject, but his lectures can be a bit disorganized.

reviews.subject: Computer Science 101
reviews.review: Dr. Davis is very approachable and always willing to help students outside of class.

reviews.subject: Organic Chemistry
reviews.review: Prof. Wilson is knowledgeable, but his teaching style is difficult to follow.

reviews.subject: Microeconomics
reviews.review: Dr. Martinez makes economics fun and relatable. Highly recommend!

reviews.subject: Philosophy
reviews.review: Prof. Garcia encourages deep thinking and lively discussions in class.

reviews.subject: Data Structures
reviews.review: Dr. Rodriguez is fantastic! Her teaching methods are clear and effective.

reviews.subject: Modern Literature
reviews.review: Prof. Lee has great insights but often goes off-topic.

reviews.subject: Biochemistry
reviews.review: Dr. Walker is very supportive and helps students grasp difficult concepts.

reviews.subject: Statistics
reviews.review: Prof. Hall's lectures are too fast-paced and hard to keep up with.

reviews.subject: World History
reviews.review: Dr. Young is a brilliant storyteller and makes history come alive.

reviews.subject: Environmental Science
reviews.review: Prof. Hernandez is passionate but can be unstructured in his lectures.

reviews.subject: Linear Algebra
reviews.review: Dr. King is approachable and provides excellent resources for study.

reviews.subject: Business Management
reviews.review: Prof. Wright offers practical insights and real-world examples.

reviews.subject: Digital Media
reviews.review: Dr. Scott has great content, but the class could use more structure.

reviews.subject: Sociology
reviews.review: Prof. Adams fosters a welcoming environment for discussion and debate.

reviews.subject: Machine Learning
reviews.review: Dr. Nelson is an expert in her field and explains complex concepts clearly.

reviews.subject: Ethics
reviews.review: Prof. Baker is knowledgeable but can be too theoretical at times.
